summary: Naming refactor verification complete: SuperPin → PinPan League, PingPongSpectator → PinPan Live. All major changes verified - labels renamed correctly, Arena routes work, Tournaments button navigates to /pinpanclub/arena.

issues: Translation keys 'superpin.ranking.noPlayers' and 'superpin.ranking.noPlayersHint' show as raw keys instead of translated text - missing translations in i18n files

passed_tests: PingPongDashboard at /pinpanclub shows 'League' button in header nav (NOT 'Super Pin')
PingPongDashboard shows 'PinPan League' in green banner section (NOT 'Super Pin Ranking')
PingPongDashboard has 'Arena' button (indigo/purple) in header nav
PingPongDashboard has 'Rapid Pin' button in header nav
/pinpanclub/arena page loads correctly (PinPan Arena - Tournament Hub)
/pinpanclub/live/test-match-id route exists and shows 'Match not found' (PinPan Live working)
Landing page shows 'Ranking' icon (not Super Pin)
Backend: GET /tournaments/{id} - get tournament details works
shared.jsx: PinPan League label for Trophy module
action_items: Add missing translation keys to i18n files: superpin.ranking.noPlayers and superpin.ranking.noPlayersHint (or update SuperPinRanking.jsx to use existing superpin.players.noPlayers key)
critical_code_review_comments: SuperPinRanking.jsx line 107: Correctly shows 'PinPan League' title
PingPongDashboard.jsx: League, Arena, Rapid Pin, Tournaments buttons all correctly renamed
PinPan Live route /pinpanclub/live/:matchId exists in App.js
Arena backend APIs all working correctly

success_rate.frontend: 95% (minor i18n key mismatch for empty state text)

seed_data_creation: Created and deleted TEST_Naming_Refactor_Tournament for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Naming refactor from SuperPin to PinPan League is complete. All user-facing labels changed correctly. Routes unchanged (still /pinpanclub/superpin/*). Tournaments button now navigates to /pinpanclub/arena. PinPan Live route added at /pinpanclub/live/:matchId for spectator mode. Minor i18n issue: SuperPinRanking uses t('superpin.ranking.noPlayers') but the key is under superpin.players.noPlayers in the i18n files.
